Title: Requires the board of elections in a city with a population of one million or more to provide certain notices prior to a change of polling place
Summary: Requires the board of elections in a city with a population of one million or more to notify by mail state and county party committees and certain elected officials prior to a change of polling place.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to requiring the board of elections in a city with a population of one million or more to provide certain notices prior to a change of polling place
